privacy.NSBluetoothAlwaysUsageDescription: This app requires Bluetooth access for connecting to nearby devices.
privacy.NSCalendarsUsageDescription: This app requires access to your calendars for social event integration.
privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: This app requires camera access to capture photos and videos.
privacy.NSContactsUsageDescription: This app requires access to your contacts for enhanced social features.
privacy.NSFaceIDUsageDescription: This app requires Face ID for secure authentication.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: This app requires location access even when in the background for geotagging.
privacy.NSLocationUsageDescription: This app requires location access to provide local content.
privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: This app requires location access while using the app.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: This app requires microphone access for recording audio and videos.
privacy.NSFocusStatusUsageDescription: This app uses focus status to optimize notifications.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: This app requires access to add photos to your library.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: This app requires access to your photo library.
privacy.NSUserTrackingUsageDescription: This app uses tracking to deliver personalized content.

name: driftywinds' Nyx AltStore Repo
subtitle: mod by ethMods
description:
This repo is for Instagram Nyx only. It is compatible with SideStore, AltStore and most other sideloading apps.

Learn more: - https://t.me/+rvcObIvOpctiMDI9

Apps might download as '.zip' just change the extension back to '.ipa' .

Kofi - https://ko-fi.com/driftywinds
Liberapay - https://liberapay.com/driftywinds/donate
Patreon - https://www.patreon.com/bePatron?u=67102544
